ref.div: Bohrmann, G., Henrich, R. & Thiede, J. Miocene to Quaternary paleoceanography in the Northern North Atlantic: variability in carbonate and biogenic opal accumulation in Geological History of the Polar Oceans: Arctic versus Antarctic (eds Ulrich Bleil & Jörn Thiede) 647–675 (Springer Netherlands, 1990).
